name: Balty's Big Day!
description: This is Balty's Big Day, a project made for the Extra Credits 2020 Game Jam(#6). It was made by Theoden Swaby (Spriter Theo), Caitlin Ricks, and Scott Rose(FocusNIL) in 72 hours. We tried to hit the theme of Take Care by asking the user to take care not to step on anyone. We hope you enjoy, feedback is very welcome!
